title: MBMBaM 476: Face 2 Face: Super-Snake Begins
description: We’re returning from a big, wild family vacation, and so we present to you our big, wild live show from Atlanta! We performed it last weekend, back when we were SO jacked up on Coca-Cola that a beam of brown, carbonated energy shot out of our chest and blew a hole in the ceiling. You probably read about it in the newspapers.
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Justin McElroy)
